document.full_text: air france-klm was placed under investigation friday by a french court for involuntary manslaughter over the crash in 2009 of its flight 447 between rio and paris which killed 228 people, its ceo said.
document.title: air france faces court investigation over rio crash
lines_and_colors: air france-klm was placed under investigation friday by a french court for involuntary manslaughter over the crash in 2009 of its flight 447 between rio and paris which killed 228 people, its ceo said.
